feature: Consolidate icon libraries (lucide, tabler, radix) to single library
description: The web app uses THREE separate icon libraries: lucide-react, @tabler/icons-react, and @radix-ui/react-icons. Found usage across 45+ files. Each library adds significant bundle weight and they often contain duplicate icon designs.
summary: Consolidate three icon libraries (lucide-react, @tabler/icons-react, @radix-ui/react-icons) into a single library (lucide-react) to reduce bundle size and simplify maintenance. Analysis shows lucide-react is already the primary library (40+ files), while tabler (1 file) and radix-icons (1 file) have minimal usage.

subtasks.notes: Successfully replaced IconDotsVertical from @tabler/icons-react with GripVertical from lucide-react in compare.tsx. Both import and component usage updated.

subtasks.notes: Successfully replaced ArrowRightIcon from @radix-ui/react-icons with ArrowRight from lucide-react in bento-grid.tsx. Updated import statement and both component usages (lines 81 and 100). Changes committed: df7bf22
